quoteText:
What is Syniverse's lawful basis for processing personal data?

Syniverse will only be able to process personal data if it can demonstrate it has a lawful processing ground – such as performance of a contract, reliance on its legitimate interests – where processing is to comply with a legal obligation or with consent from the individual whose personal information is processed.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
